mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfor (user_name, status, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, msg, login_time) values (#{userName}, #{status}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{msg}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
select a.info_id, a.user_name, a.ipaddr, a.login_location, a.browser, a.os, a.status, a.msg, a.login_time from sys_logininfor a left JOIN sys_user b on a.user_name = b.user_name
AND a.ipaddr like concat('%', #{ipaddr}, '%')
AND a.status = #{status}
AND a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and date_format(a.login_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.login_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
AND (b.dept_id = #{params.deptId} OR b.dept_id IN ( SELECT d.dept_id FROM sys_dept d WHERE FIND_IN_SET (#{params.deptId},d.ancestors) ))
AND b.user_name = #{loginName}
order by a.info_id desc
